column5: I thought landing a few bow's was fun enough but was pleasently surprised to hook into this bonus Brown. Fish hit a white and red Riverwood jig. Any thoughts on why this Brown was mixed in with the Bow's?
Dropback from the fall, still in the river system. I caught a few earlier in the season.
He wanted to be cool like the steelies...peer pressure. Sometimes fish get mixed up in the wrong crowd lol
Nice brown man !!!! its always a bonus when you hook-up with a brown,nice pic too....cheers
That's a pretty brown, love the colours...  Mike
Nice brown there! That fish is still quite 'chrome' wasn't sitting in river all fall , winter. The browns go shallow this time of year looking for food and warmth.  cheers,  ehg
